mapper.select: select * from (select rownum r_num, t.* from (select * from tourlist order by 1 desc) t) where r_num between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update from tourlist set title = #{title}, region = #{region}, content = #{content},tourdate = #{tourdate}, imga = #{imga}, imgb = #{imgb}, imgc = #{imgc}, updatedate = sysdate where num = #{num}
